svg.title: CE-04: Innovation Capacity Amplification System
svg.desc: Advanced spiral visualization showing how principle mastery creates exponential increases in innovation capacity, breakthrough frequency, and creative problem-solving capability with measurable innovation metrics and real-time tracking analytics.
svg.text: Exponential innovation growth through systematic principle mastery and AI-enhanced creative collaboration
Real-time tracking • Breakthrough analytics • Creative capacity optimization

g.text: 1. Integrate Intelligent Review principle for 25% breakthrough frequency boost
2. Implement cross-team innovation sharing to unlock collective intelligence multiplier
3. Establish innovation risk portfolio with 30% high-risk, 50% medium-risk, 20% low-risk distribution
📱 Mobile-Optimized • 🎯 Touch-Friendly • ⚡ Offline-Capable • ♿ WCAG 2.1 AA Compliant
Innovation Tracking: Real-time analytics with 520% amplification potential
